name: Oracle at Delphi
description:
This game was made in an hour with the theme "Oracle at Delphi" based on the suggestion of a redditor.

I'm not super pleased with how this came out. It took me longer than I would've liked to program. I didn't use strings but opted to use active objects with text written on them, so that took longer. And I didn't really get to program in anything except the very minimum of the idea I had.
